AC 14 	Initiative +2 (12)	Tiny Dragon, Neutral Good
Purple Worm
What Gnaws the Roots of the World
Habitat: Desert, Underdark; Treasure: None
Titanic purple worms burrow through the earth and sand. Ever
ravenous, they devour smaller creatures and ravage entire
communities in their aimless burrowing.
HP 10 (3d4 + 3)
Speed 15 ft., Fly 60 ft.
MOD 	SAVE

CR 1/4 (XP 50; PB +2)
Traits
Magic Resistance. The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against
spells and other magical effects.
Actions
Multiattack. The pseudodragon makes two Bite attacks.
Bite. Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.
Sting. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can
see within 5 feet.
Failure: 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the
Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the
